pullrequest.title: Add ability to statically step both feet

content.raw:
More specifically, this is what I see:
```
[AtlasSimInterface] Initializing, version 3.0.2.
 [AtlasSimInterface] Successfully opened logfile /home/jackie/.gazebo/AtlasSimInterface.log
 [AtlasSimInterface] Current stack size is unlimited (acceptable).
```

When I press "I" to go forward, I get the following:

```
=== Resetting taskspace desireds in ss sway ===
[ssSwayState] Resetting path to
[  0.070376	 0.006677	 0.000002	 ]
=== Setting up sway ===
Setting up orientation spline
1) Setting up p spline. p_com_init 0.058399, 0.007021, 1.106276
2) Setting up p spline. p_target 0.059836 -0.132366
3) Setting up p spline. p_toe 0.213095 0.110333
4) Setting up p spline. p_mid 0.186402 0.068062
spline _x
spline _y
First call of calculate_taskspace_desireds()
AtlasSimBehaviorStep::enable_delayed_transition_to called 
[AtlasSimInterface] Atlas3Step::ssStepState::populate_step_path(): Insufficient number of steps retrieved. Transition to stand 
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::out_of_range'
  what():  vector::_M_range_check
```

I copied libAtlasSimInterface.so.3.0.2 as libAtlasSimInterface3.so.3.0.2 into the install/lib directory of my catkin workspace.
content.html:
More specifically, this is what I see:

[AtlasSimInterface] Initializing, version 3.0.2.
 [AtlasSimInterface] Successfully opened logfile /home/jackie/.gazebo/AtlasSimInterface.log
 [AtlasSimInterface] Current stack size is unlimited (acceptable).

When I press "I" to go forward, I get the following:

=== Resetting taskspace desireds in ss sway ===
[ssSwayState] Resetting path to
[  0.070376  0.006677    0.000002    ]
=== Setting up sway ===
Setting up orientation spline
1) Setting up p spline. p_com_init 0.058399, 0.007021, 1.106276
2) Setting up p spline. p_target 0.059836 -0.132366
3) Setting up p spline. p_toe 0.213095 0.110333
4) Setting up p spline. p_mid 0.186402 0.068062
spline _x
spline _y
First call of calculate_taskspace_desireds()
AtlasSimBehaviorStep::enable_delayed_transition_to called 
[AtlasSimInterface] Atlas3Step::ssStepState::populate_step_path(): Insufficient number of steps retrieved. Transition to stand 
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::out_of_range'
  what():  vector::_M_range_check

I copied libAtlasSimInterface.so.3.0.2 as libAtlasSimInterface3.so.3.0.2 into the install/lib directory of my catkin workspace.
